sponsors.name: CanAuz Overseas Careers
sponsors.details: Canauz Overseas is a visa assistance and immigration consultancy company in Hyderabad, India. They offer a range of services, including visa processing.

sponsors.name: CrossPapers
sponsors.details: CrossPapers is software company with a moto 'Empowering Education Through Innovative Software'. They develop software tools that are intuitive, adaptable, and tailored to modern learning environments.
